# Artifacts

Pipeline outputs are stored here.

## Files

- `metrics.json` - Aggregated statistics with n/N denominators (tracked)
- `themes.json` - Clustered themes with representative quotes (tracked)
- `rankings.json` - Weighted priority scores (tracked)
- `brief.pdf` - Executive summary (requires approval to commit)

## Generated By

```bash
python scripts/build_rollups.py --input data/clean.csv --output artifacts/
```
